Hi,

I am currently writing an academic report (for the University of
Technology, Sydney) on the topic / hypothesis:

"The open source unit-testing framework consisting of (JUnit, HttpUnit and
JUnitPerf) is a practical means of Performance testing web-based Java
applications."

My report requires a review of the existing literature but I have been
having a certain amount of difficulty since the topic is a little obscure
/ specific.

I was wondering whether anyone could direct me to any data, information,
reports or academic assesments of these three tools and their use in
performance testing (of any web-based application is good, but preference
for Java involvement).

Also, academic works on closely related areas would be thankfully received
as well.

Please reply to
edsillen@...

Many Thanks, :)
Edwin Sillence.
subject: RFA - Seeking information for University Report on Open-Source
